org.zelvator.tester

Class Tester

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • org.zelvator.tester.Tester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Tester
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This Frame represents The Tester, which loads questions from file into array and randomly set questions to the end of the list.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Tester(java.util.List<Question> questions, TestEditation testEditation, java.lang.String name)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initialize components.

      • changeWindow

        public void changeWindow()
        Method will change window depending on if there is some image for this question or not. The code will resize window and set image panel to not visible, if someone could manage to get over locked resizing somehow.

      • moreThanOneAnswer

        Method for deciding if the question has more answers or only one.

        Method will take some parameters from AnswerReaction where percentage score is calculated and here it is added and calculated average percentage of all completed questions.
        Parameters:
        correctAnswers -
        totalAnwers -
        percent -

      • refreshMultipleAnswers

        public void refreshMultipleAnswers()
        This method will update and refresh JList with answers, for this particular method is needed to make possible to select multiple answers. I thought it would be better to select it with your mouse without holding CTRL key. So this will make it possible. Additionally it can render images in here, as the other refreshSomethingInJList methods.

      • refreshAnswers

        public void refreshAnswers()
        This method is used for updating JList, where only one answer is correct.
